t: Amazon Brand Registry | Sell on Amazon
s: Enroll your brand in Amazon Brand Registry to unlock tools designed to protect and build your brand, creating a better experience for your Amazon customers.

t: Brand+ and Performance+ Now Available in Amazon DSP Globally | Amazon Ads
s: March 21, 2025 - From a campaign management perspective, by automating the traditional 70-step campaign creation process, Brand+ and Performance+ reduce complexity and provide real-time reporting and AI-driven optimizations, enabling brands to stay competitive and drive better business results.

t: Amazon’s new 'Buy for Me' feature helps customers find and buy products from other brands’ sites
s: April 3, 2025 - New beta feature allows customers to use their Amazon Shopping app to complete purchases from other brand retailer websites if Amazon doesn’t sell the item directly.

t: Amazon brand statistics rank ecommerce, digital shelf analytics
s: Amazon brand statistics rank ecommerce or digital shelf analytics based on syndication of millions of product data-sheets of tens of thousands of brands in all major languages.

t: VFAUOSIT Brand Kitchen Faucets Recalled Due to Dangerous Lead Exposure for Young Children; Sold on Amazon.com by Whisper08 | CPSC.gov

t: Amazon IP Accelerator: Trademark support for your brand
s: We created the IP Accelerator program with small and medium businesses in mind. Get help registering your trademark, or work with a service provider to file a copyright or patent application, research potential brand names, or manage an IP dispute.

t: Amazon Logo and symbol, meaning, history, PNG, brand
s: The curved orange line reminds us of a friendly smile, and the company managed to use this symbol to the maximum, making a legend out of simple lines. Amazon founder Jeff Bezos did not want to spend money on additional branding elements, such as package design.
